## VirtualScrollPagingAbstractComponent.\_initEvents() method

Initialize base events for scrolling

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected _initEvents(element: Element, bodyElement: HTMLElement, document?: HTMLDocument): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | <code>Element</code> | Element which scrolling is tracked |
|  bodyElement | <code>HTMLElement</code> | Element that changes when new data are loaded |
|  document | <code>HTMLDocument</code> | Html document |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
